articles.title: Kim Jong Il Receives Chinese Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives Chinese Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il  received the visiting delegation of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China led by its Head Wang Jiarui on Monday.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon, department directors of the C.C., WPK, and Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					  Wang courteously conveyed to Kim Jong Il a verbal personal message from Hu Jintao, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, and presented him with a gift prepared by the delegation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed thanks for this and asked Wang Jiarui to convey his regards to Hu Jintao. He had a cordial and friendly conversation with Wang.
					
					 Then he hosted a dinner for the guests.
					
					 The dinner proceeded in an amicable atmosphere.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Chinese Party Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Chinese Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with the delegation of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China led by Head Wang Jiarui at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 Wang Jiarui said that he could witness during his visit to the DPRK the great success achieved by the Korean people in various sectors under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who continues to provide field guidance.
					
					 He expressed the will to make positive efforts to boost the bilateral relations on a new higher stage.

articles.title: DPRK to Take Strong Measures against Anti-DPRK Fanatics
articles.content:
DPRK to Take Strong Measures against Anti-DPRK Fanatics
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of People's Security and the Ministry of State Security of the DPRK released the following joint statement Monday as regards the south Korean authorities' attempt to bring down the system in the DPRK, which has recently gone beyond the danger line:
					The south Korean authorities are more persistently pursuing their moves to force the DPRK to "dismantle its nukes first" in a bid to deprive it of its nuclear deterrent for self-defence, while following outsiders in utter disregard of the dignity and security of the nation. Their military provocations for intruding into the inviolable territorial waters, airspace and land of the DPRK and espionage and conspiratorial plots to topple its system have reached an extreme phase.
					
					Typical examples of them are the adventurous military moves of the warmongers of the south Korean military to preserve the illegal "northern limit line" in the West Sea of Korea and the reckless "operations to destabilize the north" being staged by them via the frontline and coastal and border areas.
					
					The daily escalating scattering of leaflets over areas of the DPRK has escalated into its depth from the frontline areas and the foolish operations to bring down the system involving all spy forces and means find their way to the deep inland of the DPRK, after going beyond the boundary of areas around it.
					
					The "National Intelligence Service", the "Defense Security Command" and other ill-famed espionage and plot-breeding organizations of south Korea are acting a shock brigade for carrying them out. Involved in them are government institutions including the "Defense Ministry", the "Ministry of Unification" and the "Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade" and trigger-happy groups of the military and ultra-right conservatives under the direct control and command of those institutions as well as human scum.
					
					All these moves go to clearly prove that the south Korean authorities have entered into the phase of putting the already rounded off "OPLAN 5029" and "Emergency Ruling Plan-Puhung" into practice while deliberately creating the fiction of "emergency situation" in the DPRK.
					
					Under the prevailing situation which should not be overlooked the Ministry of People's Security and the Ministry of State Security of the DPRK clarify their principled stand as follows:
					
					1. The People's Security and State Security forces of the DPRK will take all-out strong measures to foil the treacherous, anti-reunification and anti-peace moves of the riff-raffs to bring down the dignified socialist system in the DPRK and destabilize it.
					
					There is no room for the group of traitors to stay in Korea and on the earth as they bring harm to the country with their back turned on the nation.
					
					2. Not only the revolutionary strong army of Mt. Paektu but also the people's security and state security forces and all their means will be mobilized for the sacred struggle to defend our socialist system and security of the country from the moves of all the hostile forces.
					
					We have world-level ultra-modern striking force and means for protecting security which have neither yet been mentioned nor opened to the public in total.
					
					3. The south Korean authorities should immediately disband all the plot-breeding machines and bodies of the authorities going against national reconciliation, cooperation, peaceful reunification and prosperity and take due measures to eliminate the main culprits in the joint name of the nation, if they do not want to meet the same bitter end as the successive anti-DPRK confrontation fanatics and traitors did.
					
					There has already started a nationwide just retaliatory battle to make a clean sweep of all the unsavory forces hell-bent on the moves to stem the trend of the times.
					
					It is an invariable primary mission and duty for our people's security and state security forces to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and ensure security of the country and people's happiness.
					
					The south Korean authorities would be well advised to behave themselves before being too late if they do not want to be judged by the nation on the day of national reunification for being "modern type of five traitors of 1905."

articles.title: Inter-Korean Tour Talks Held
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Tour Talks Held
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- An inter-Korean working contact for the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang and the Kaesong areas was made in Kaesong on Monday.
					 At the contact the north side referred to the fact that it has so far made sincere efforts for the tour of Mt. Kumgang and the Kaesong area, a symbol of the inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 When there occurred a "Mt. Kumgang tourist incident", the north side immediately expressed regret, regardless of its circumstances and made a detailed clarification of the truth about it.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the north side took a bold measure to solve all the issues raised by the chairwoman of Hyundai Group of south Korea during her visit to Pyongyang last August, and officially made public with the group a joint press release guaranteeing the safety of south side's tourists.
					
					There are neither reason nor conditions hindering the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang and the Kaesong area as the north side already clarified the truth behind the incident and firmly guaranteed at a high level the non-recurrence of similar incident and the safety of south side's tourists.
					
					 The north side urged the south side to retract all the unjust preconditions if it is truly interested in the resumption of the tour.
					
					 The north side, with a view to resuming the tour as soon as possible and bringing about a turning phase in the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, presented a draft agreement containing its positive proposal to resume the tour of the Kaesong area from the 1st of March and the tour of Mt. Kumgang from the 1st of April and called on the south side to affirmatively respond to it.
					
					 However, the south side, far from accepting the north side's sincere proposal, let loose a tirade about "three conditions" and the like and made a far-fetched assertion that it is impossible to resume the tour unless they are met. It deliberately created complexity in the discussion, behaving so arrogantly that it perpetrated such indiscreet act as "praying silently."
					
					 By speaking with perfect logic and citing facts the north side chided the south side for insisting on its arrogant and insincere attitude and far-fetched assertion, making such irrelevant remarks as "probe into truth" and resorting to delaying tactics. It made every possible positive effort to reach an agreement on the issue of resuming the tour. 
					
					 The south side, however, persistently insisted on its wrong assertion and dodged the discussion on the issue, spelling out the word "study" in the end but refused to fix the date for the next contact. 
					
					 At the contact both sides thus failed to reach any agreement due to the insincere attitude on the part of the south side. 
					
					 They agreed to further consultations about the issue of resuming the tour in the days ahead.

articles.title: Meeting Marks Anniversary of Creation of Chongsan-ri
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Anniversary of Creation of Chongsan-ri
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture here on Monday to mark the 50th anniversary of the Chongsan-ri spirit and the Chongsan-ri method created by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Chongsan-ri spirit and method based on the great Juche idea and the revolutionary mass line are the Juche method of work that helps the popular masses maintain the stand as the masters of the revolution and construction and fulfill their responsibility and role as the masters. They are also the scientific and revolutionary idea and method for mass leadership which comprehended and systematized in an integrated way the Workers' Party of Korea's idea and theory on mass leadership.
					
					 Present at the meeting were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions and industrial establishments and farms and working people in the city of Pyongyang, exemplary officials and farmers in the city of Nampho and Chongsan-ri, Kangso District.
					
					 A report was made there by Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Il Sung created the Chongsan-ri spirit and Chongsan-ri method during his field guidance to Chongsan-ri and Kangso County in February Juche 49 (1960), the reporter described this as a historic event that provided a landmark for epochal turn in the drive of the WPK and the Korean people to build socialism.
					
					 The President applied the above-said spirit and method in the economic management to establish the unique system of Korean style for guiding and managing the economy and thus brought about a radical improvement in socialist construction, the reporter noted, and went on to say:
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated this mass leadership method as the work method of the President's style and energetically led the drive to embody it in the whole party, stressing that the WPK should thoroughly establish the President's method of work as it serves to materialize his revolutionary ideas.
					
					 He has led the overall work of the party, the army and the state in the thick of reality, making an endless forced march of on-site guidance to distant military posts and construction sites in great surge without rest to provide prosperity of the country and people's happiness. This peculiar mode of revolution is the culmination of the President's method of work and the great Juche-based method of revolutionary leadership that makes it possible to achieve a brilliant victory in the revolution and construction.
					
					 We will surely build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in this land under the ever-victorious Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and accomplish the cause of Juche, and thus give steady continuity to the sacred revolutionary history of the President along with the prospering country.

articles.title: Guidelines for Development of Socialist Agriculture
articles.content:
Guidelines for Development of Socialist Agriculture
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung created a method of guiding the masses, namely Chongsan-ri spirit and Chongsan-ri method, during his half-a-month stay in Chongsan-ri, then Kangso County, South Phyongan Province in February Juche 49 (1960).
					 In those days he, after meeting with peasants to learn about the actual conditions of the farm and their living, convened a ri Party meeting to give instructions as to the management of the country's rural economy.
					
					 In a historic speech titled "For Correct Management of Socialist Agriculture" he clearly expounded all the issues concerning the management of socialist agriculture including those of concentrating all efforts on farming, properly doing the work of planning and adhering to the socialist principle of distribution.
					
					 The meeting marked a historic occasion in bringing about a new turn in the management and development of socialist agriculture.
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding ideas and theories he elucidated at the meeting, rural communities of the country have been able to liquidate all handovers from old society and made a leap forward, registering signal achievements in the effort for the ultimate settlement of the rural question. 
					
					 His profound ideas and exploits concerning socialist rural construction have been successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Visiting rural communities throughout the country, he has wisely guided them to strictly meet the requirements of the Juche method of farming and illuminated a shortcut to a radical development of agriculture in the new century.
					
					 His far-sighted plan and wise leadership have resulted in a radical turn in seed selection, potato and bean farming and double cropping and tremendous achievements in large-scale land rezoning and nature-driven waterway projects and comprehensive mechanization of agriculture, culminating in epoch-making changes in the socialist rural construction of the country.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Valery Sukhinin arranged a reception Monday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the conclusion of the treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairwoman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 The Russian ambassador said in his speech that a basic document for the development of Russia-DPRK relations was concluded to suit the new conditions ten years ago. This has greatly contributed to boosting the bilateral friendly relations, he added.
					
					 He recalled that multifaceted contacts and exchange have been brisk between Russia and the DPRK and the two countries have cooperated with each other in the international arena, too.
					
					 He stressed that Russian President Medvedev and Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Kim Jong Il have paid deep attention to the development of the bilateral relations.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, addressing the reception, referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il enjoyed the performance of opera "Evgeni Onegin" together with the Russian ambassador to the DPRK and diplomats of his embassy. This indicates that the bilateral relations are developing on a high stage, he added.
					
					 He expressed conviction that these relations would further develop on the principle of respect for sovereignty, equality and mutual benefit in the spirit of the agreed joint documents including the inter-state treaty.
					
					 A reception was also given at the Russian Consulate General in Chongjin on the same day on this occasion.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Feb. 4 on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of the conclusion of the treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation and the New Year.
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the Foreign Ministry of Russia including Vice-Minister Aleksei Borodavkin. 
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Russia and staff members of his embassy were on hand.
					
					 The participants first looked round photos on display on the theme of "The whole life dedicated to the people" and "Arts of DPRK".
					
					 The vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia and the DPRK ambassador made speeches at the reception.
					
					 The speakers underscored the need to work hard for the development of the bilateral relations this year that marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the DPRK-Russia joint declaration, the 10th anniversary of the conclusion of the above-said treaty and the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Peace Prize from Nepal Journalist Association
articles.content:
Peace Prize from Nepal Journalist Association
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received "Peace Prize for 2009" from the Nepal Journalist Association.
					 A ceremony of conveying the prize was held in Kathmandu on Feb. 3.
					
					 Present there were personages of the association, the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist) and the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association and the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Kathmandu.
					
					 The prize was handed over to the DPRK ambassador.

articles.title: Gift from Nepal Journalist Association
articles.content:
Gift from Nepal Journalist Association
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Nepal Journalist Association on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The gift was handed to the DPRK ambassador to Nepal by Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the association, on Feb. 3.

articles.title: US Moves for MD Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
US Moves for MD Flayed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Solidarity for Progress in south Korea called a joint press conference in Seoul on Feb. 5 denouncing the U.S. for trying to plug south Korea into the missile defense(MD) system .
					 A press release read out at the press conference recalled that the U.S. Department of Defense on Feb. 1 opened to the public a "report on examining the ballistic missile defense plan" which contains the policy and strategies of the U.S. administration on the MD.
					
					 The press release held that the action taken by the U.S. with a hue and cry over the non-existent "threat from the north" reveals its black-hearted intention to plug south Korea into the U.S.-led MD in a bid to make it cover an astronomical amount of funds for building the missile shields.
					
					 It demanded an immediate stop to the moves to establish the MD which sparks off an arms race and runs counter to achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK FM Statement Supported in Czech
articles.content:
DPRK FM Statement Supported in Czech
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association released a statement on February 2 in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The statement said that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is a target of the policy consistently pursued by the government of the DPRK. The conclusion of a peace treaty will have a positive impact on putting an end to the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. and denuclearizing the peninsula, it held.
					
					 Noting that there will be no grounds whatsoever for the U.S. to oppose the conclusion of a peace treaty if it truly wants peace on the peninsula, the statement urged it to immediately respond to the proposal of the DPRK and come out to replace the Korean Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty as early as possible.
					
					 The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association fully supports the proposal of the DPRK on the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S., it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued its bulletin on Feb. 1 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Birthday of Great Leader" said that Kim Jong Il has defended the socialist cause with his Songun politics and wisely led the Korean people to build a thriving nation, successfully carrying to completion the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 All the achievements of the Korean people are the fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, it noted.
					
					 In an article headlined "100,000 Flats" the bulletin referred to the facts that thanks to the popular policies of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government 100,000 flats are now being successfully built in Pyongyang with apartment houses in Mansudae Street as a model, the drive to build more streets and villages reminiscent of fairyland in the 21st century is making dynamic progress in the urban and rural areas and the people enjoy a happy life in modern houses free from the worry about the house rent.
					
					 It also edited the joint New Year editorial of the leading newspapers of the DPRK and articles introducing the April spring friendship art festival and the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Nepal and India and a seminar in Mongolia on Jan. 29 and Feb. 3 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 Bam Dev Gautam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), said that Kim Jong Il is the great leader not only of the Korean people but of the world progressives, adding that he is now energetically leading the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation through his ceaseless field guidance.
					
					 V. K. Chopra, chairman of the Indian Intellectuals' Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that Kim Jong Il has embodied the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, glorifying Korean style socialism centred on the popular masses and giving full play to the might of the DPRK in the international arena with his unique Songun politics. 
					
					 Davaadorj Begz, chairman of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun, highly praised the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il. He vowed to make a deep-going study of the Juche idea, the Songun idea and contribute to boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in India and Mongolia.

articles.title: DPRK Holidays to Be Celebrated in Eq. Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays to Be Celebrated in Eq. Guinea
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was inaugurated in Equatorial Guinea on Feb. 2.
					 Santiago Ngua Nfumu, first deputy general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and vice-minister of Information, Culture and Tourism, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the February holiday.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- One summer day in Juche 37 (1948) President Kim Il Sung made a call to the principal of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School to ask about the schoolchildren's summer vacation.
					 After being briefed on what they were doing during vacation, the President said that the school should organize sightseeing for the parentless schoolchildren with no place to go as those with parents went home, provided with something to eat by the school.
					
					 He then suggested that the principal take them to Mt. Kumgang or somewhere so that they could be delighted so much as they were with their parents and that they could enjoy the vacation climbing fantastic peaks like Piro and collecting plants. 
					
					 His tender-hearted suggestion for the bereaved schoolchildren touched the heartstrings of the principal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero acondicionado de manera moderna.
					 Los obreros del complejo y los voluntarios terminaron durante dos anos la dificil y vasta obra desplegando con vigor la lucha por construir la moderna fabrica de vinalon.
					
					 Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano de la fabrica se entero detalladamente del estado de construccion y de produccion recorriendo durante largo tiempo los talleres del acetato de vinilo, de polimerizacion y de hilado vertical y otros lugares del complejo.
					
					 El Dirigente expreso gran satisfaccion de que los obreros del complejo y los voluntarios llevaron a cabo excelentemente por sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas en un corto tiempo la vasta obra equivalente a la construccion de una gran base quimica guardando en el corazon el proposito del partido de desarrollar al estilo coreano la economia y mejorar la vida del pueblo a base de nuestro cimiento economico.
					
					 Deviene un asombroso milagro el hecho de que en las condiciones tan dificiles los constructores prepararon con sus propias fuerzas los preciosos bienes de eterna duracion al dedicar todo lo suyo superando con valentia las dificultades y pruebas interpuestas, dijo y dio agradecimiento a ellos evaluando altamente sus orgullosas proezas acumuladas ante la patria y el pueblo.
					
					 Al mirar largo tiempo con gran emocion el vinalon que se produce sin cesar en la hiladora, senalo cordialmente que posibilitan suministrar gran cantidad de telas de vinalon a nuestro pueblo y satisfacer el anhelo del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien tenia durante toda su vida.
					
					Se refirio a que nuestros obreros eran los combatientes vanguardistas que lucharon con abnegacion pensando solo en los intereses de la revolucion en las epocas dificiles de la revolucion incluida la de rehabilitacion de la posguerra y la construccion de la base socialista y subrayo que todos deben vivir y luchar siempre con el mismo espiritu de aquel dia en que levantaban sobre la ruina el paraiso del pueblo.
					
					Diciendo que son muy importantes el deber y el papel del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero porque esta fabrica esta relacionada directamente con la vida del pueblo, indico las tareas programaticas que le incumben.
					
					Subrayo que el Complejo debe profundizar la labor de investigacion cientifica para producir varios articulos quimicos inclusive semiproductos de vinalon y, a la vez, perfeccionar el proceso de produccion de compuestos aromaticos para fortalecer aun mas el caracter jucheano de la industria quimica.
					
					Apunto que son muy importantes el vinalon y el abono quimico en la solucion de los problemas de alimento y el vestido del pueblo y agrego que los funcionarios, los obreros y los tecnicos de este complejo y el otro de Abonos Quimicos de Hungnam, bien conscientes de su mision, deben normalizar la produccion y prestar profunda atencion a las labores para desarrollar con vista al futuro las fabricas.
					
					El Dirigente se fotografio junto a los innovadores laborales quienes contribuyeron grandemente a la construccion de la fabrica de vinalon.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Thae Jong Su, los jefes de departamento, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek y los primeros subjefes de departamento, Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang, Ri Jae Il y Jon Il Chun, del CC del PTC.

articles.title: MINSEP y MINSEE deciden frustrar tajantemente maniobras anti-RPDC
articles.content:
MINSEP y MINSEE deciden frustrar tajantemente maniobras anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ATCC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias, sobrepasan el limite alarmante las tentativas de las autoridades surcoreanas para derrocar el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo y el Ministerio de Seguridad Estatal de la RPDC hicieron publica el dia 8 la siguiente declaracion conjunta:
					Se tornan cada vez mas persistentes las maniobras para la "renuncia nuclear, primero" que consisten en eliminar en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas nuestro disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa sin tomar en consideracion la dignidad ni la seguridad de la nacion.
					
					Mientras tanto, llegan al extremo las provocaciones militares en los sagrados espacios maritimos, aereos y territoriales bajo nuestra jurisdiccion y la campana de espionaje y conspiracion para derrocar nuestro regimen.
					
					Un buen ejemplo de ello es el aventurero movimiento militar de los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea para defender la ilegal "linea de limite al Norte" en el Mar Oeste de Corea y la imprudente operacion "subversiva del interior del Norte" que se comete en el frente, las costas y las zonas fronterizas.
					
					Especificamente, el lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC, que adquiere cada dia mayor intensidad, se extiende desde la linea del frente hacia la profundidad mientras las absurdas maniobras para el derrumbe de nuestro regimen, en que fueron movilizadas todas las fuerzas y medios de espionaje, se amplian de las areas adyacentes a lo profundo del interior de nuestro pais.
					
					En estas campanas se ofrecen como vanguardias los connotados organos de espionaje y conspiracion del Sur de Corea, incluyendo el "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" y la "Comandancia de Defensa y Seguridad", y se movilizan el "Ministerio de Defensa Nacional", el "Ministerio de Reunificacion", el "Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio" y otros organos con autoridad, los grupos de belicistas del circulo militar y las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas, que son controlados y dirigidos directamente por aquellos organos, y hasta los tipejos que fueron echados al basurero dejando de ser humanos.
					
					Todos estos movimientos son una muestra directa de que las autoridades surcoreanas entraron en el camino de ejecutar el "Plan operacional 5029" y el "Plan de gobernacion emergente - Puhung", que completaron circulando intencionalmente el rumor de la supuesta "situacion de emergencia" de la RPDC que no puede suceder nunca.
					
					En relacion con la actual situacion insoslayable, el MINSEP y el MINSEE de la RPDC declaran al interior y al exterior la siguiente posicion de principios:
					
					1. Nuestro ejercito de la seguridad del pueblo y de la estatal tomara fuertes medidas en todos los sentidos para frustrar las maquinaciones antinacionales, anti-reunificacion y anti-pacificas de los fulanos y menganos con vistas al derrocamiento del digno regimen socialista y a la desestabilizacion interna.
					
					No hay ningun lugar en este pais ni en el mundo donde la horda de traidores, que da espaldas a la nacion y trae las desgracias al pais, pueda estar a salvo. 
					
					2. En la sagrada lucha por defender nuestro regimen socialista y la seguridad del pais frente a las tentativas de las fuerzas hostiles de toda clase se movilizaran no solo los fusiles del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu sino tambien todas las fuerzas y medios del ejercito de la seguridad del pueblo y de la estatal.
					
					Tenemos las fuerzas de ataque y medios de seguridad sofisticados de talla mundial, a que no nos hemos referido todavia ni publicado totalmente. 
					
					3. Si las autoridades surcoreanas no quieren repetir el tragico fin de los anteriores fanaticos de confrontacion anti-RPDC y los traidores a la nacion, deben disolver inmediatamente todos los aparatos intrigantes y los organos con autoridad, que desafian a la reconciliacion y la cooperacion nacionales, a la reunificacion pacifica y la prosperidad, y tomar debidas medidas para sepultar a nombre comun de la nacion a los cabecillas de esas entidades. 
					
					Ya quedo iniciada la sagrada y justa batalla pannacional de represalia para eliminar a todas las fuerzas malsanas que estan desesperadas por bloquear la corriente de la epoca actual.
					
					Defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion y proteger la seguridad del pais y la felicidad del pueblo constituye la primera y eterna mision y obligacion de nuestro ejercito de la seguridad del pueblo y de la estatal. 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas no quieren ser enjuiciadas por la nacion en el dia de la reunificacion de la patria siendo "cinco traidores de Ulsa de cuno moderno", deben actuar con prudencia antes de que se haga tarde.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe "Premio de la Paz para 2009" de entidad nepalesa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe "Premio de la Paz para 2009" de entidad nepalesa
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el "Premio de la Paz para 2009" que le dirigiera la Asociacion de Periodistas de Nepal.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en Katmandu la ceremonia de entregarlo.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion las personalidades de la Asociacion de Periodistas de Nepal, el CC del Partido Comunista Unido de Nepal (Marxista- Leninista) y la Asociacion de Amistad Nepal-Corea, el embajador y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en ese pais.
					
					El premio fue entregado al embajador coreano.

articles.title: Cuadros de partido y Estado recorren comuna de Chongsan
articles.content:
Cuadros de partido y Estado recorren comuna de Chongsan
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 50 de la creacion del espiritu Chongsanri y el metodo Chongsanri por el Presidente           Kim Il Sung, los cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios directivos de las organizaciones de masas y los miembros del Consejo de Ministros recorrieron el dia 7 la comuna de Chongsan del municipio de Kangso.
					Primeramente, los visitantes le rindieron homenaje al Presidente tras depositar los ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en la comuna.
					
					Seguidamente, ellos recorrieron la lapida a la actividad historico-revolucionaria del Presidente y el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de la comuna de Chongsan, donde se conservan los datos historicos alusivos a las hazanas de direccion del Presidente, quien durante su visita de orientacion de quince dias en febrero del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche sobre la comuna de Chongsan y el distrito de Kangso, creo el gran ejemplo de metodo de trabajo revolucionario.
					
					El Presidente visito las familias campesinas para averiguar minuciosamente la situacion economica de ellas, departio con los funcionarios, dirigio la reunion e ilumino plenamente los metodos de labores de partido, de administracion y de economia.
